transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan ji Abhishek ji Star Pi se bol rahe hain.
Customer: Haan ji mam good morning mam.
Executive: Good morning. Aapke IndiaMART mein kuch nahi aa raha.
Customer: Achcha mam actually na main thoda bahar aaya hua tha.
Executive: Call unhe deal karega please call karaye hume. Haan main number de do ya fir mujhe bhi isse baat kar lo.
Customer: Achcha aap number note kare.
Executive: Bolo.
Executive: Ek minute.
Executive: Haan 720
Customer: 720
Executive: 720 isko fenk do. 720 isko fenk do.
Executive: 92
Customer: 92
Executive: 83353
Customer: Kaun hai ye?
Executive: Ye Pallavi hai meri manager.
Customer: Ye karegi help tumhare ko koi bhi NCR ki inquiry aa rahi hai sab bahar se aa rahi hai. Hamare useless hai bilkul IndiaMART.
Customer: Achcha sir theek mam ek baar aap baat kar lo mam se.
summary:
Concerns:

- Nothing is coming from IndiaMART.

- All NCR inquiries are coming from outside.

- IndiaMART is completely useless.



Resolution:

- Executive provided manager's number.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will talk to the manager.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- incomings, ncr inquiry, manager number
